div.class: Bgc-w Bdstart-1g Bdend-1g Mih-50 Pt-7 Pb-14

div.h1: Why is it called the Irish sea ?

div.span:
i heard the Romans called it that because of all the Irish raiders coming from the Irish sea to Britian and France Gaul .
http://www.google.ie/url?sa=i&source=ima...
bluebell the romans gave it that name . take it up with them . they called it the Irish sea as far back as 100AD .

im not saying everthing in the Irish sea is Irish that would be silly . that would mean Britian and the ilse of man and ever living thing in the sea is Irish . now thats silly . im just asking from a histrocly point of view why it was called the Irish sea by the romsns

i believe it's true . Roman records calm vast invasions from people from the Irish sea . Roman forts have been found over looking the Irish sea almost like watch towers . Roman genrals state the Irish raids becoming more of a problem . records state in 300AD Irish conqures arrive off the cost of Britian . it...

i believe it's true . Roman records calm vast invasions from people from the Irish sea . Roman forts have been found over looking the Irish sea almost like watch towers . Roman genrals state the Irish raids becoming more of a problem . records state in 300AD Irish conqures arrive off the cost of Britian . it was still going on during saxon times an opera called Tristan
